sentence.Network_en: Eurasian perennial herbs having daisylike flowers with yellow rays and dark centers.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧亚的一种四季生草本植物,花类似雏菊,花缘黄色、花心黑色.

sentence.Network_en: African or Asiatic herbs with daisylike flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 非洲和亚洲雏菊类草本.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hairy perennial Eurasian herb with yellow daisylike flowers reputed to destroy or drive away fleas ., 多毛的终年欧亚草本植物 , 有雏菊似的花 , 被认为可以驱赶跳蚤.

list.abs: African or Asiatic herbs with daisylike flowers ., 非洲和亚洲雏菊类草本.
large genus of herbs widely cultivated for their daisylike flowers ., 一个草本大属 , 因其雏菊状花而被广泛种植.
